original_title: 人付き合いが苦手な未亡人の雪女さんと呪いの指輪 販売数２万部越え！妖怪催淫姦の人気漫画を実写化！
overview: The main character acquires a ring that used to belong to the late husband of Honoka. With it, he is able to control the widow at will.  Based on a doujin with the same name, which had a little bit of horror/mystery vibe.
title: The Story Of A Snow Woman Widow Who Has Trouble Getting Along With Others And The Cursed Ring Over 20000 Copies Sold! A Live-Action Adaptation Of The Popular Ghost Sex Manga!
